page.title: 12Longworth Church (2)
page.content: Rev.Stuart enjoys his job very much.His main concerns are to finish the restoration and trying to get more people to attend church.He does not help with the Sunday School because the church services are held at the same time.The services that are held in church are 8.30 (the 1662 service) and 9.30 and 11.00 are new services, and also at Charney Bassett he holds the Evensong. The earliest parts of St Marys church date from the early part of the 13th century.Towards the end of the same century the pillars on the south side were replaced.At the same time a third bay was added to the nave westward,and the present chancel was built.The S.side was added in the 14th century, the tower & porch in the 15th and the North aisle and vestry in the 17th century.
